name: 劉建浩
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction of thesis structure and requirements
Week 2-3: How to write an academic report or thesis
Week 5-6: Real report/thesis discussion and practice
Week 7: Analytic hierarchy process introduction and practice
Week 8: Analytic network process introduction and practice
Week 9: Introduction fuzzy set theory
Week 10: TOPSIS method
Week 11: VIKOR method
Week 12-14: DEMATEL method and its hybrid methods
Week 15: Introduction to data mining using rough set theory
Week 16: Introduction multivariate analysis and demonstration
Week 17-18: Real case practice and discussion
scorePolicy:
Final Exam. 40%
In class presentation 30%
Class Participation and attendance – (in class practice) 30%
